title: Woodcut-based
content: This typeface is based on woodcuts. It will have "snap-on serifs" to make it have imperfections as keystrokes. Any input is appreciated!
author: dday

comments.content:
What's with all this snap-on action all of a sudden? Is there like a Walker School of Type Design that just opened up or something? ;-)   
   
Anyway. Although this design isn't my cup of tea, I do very much like the idea of having add-ons (not really serifs) to change the aspect of a font - a lot of potential there.   
   
hhp
